ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And watch them, for they will soon see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And wait; they will come to know soon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and see, and soon they too shall see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and watch them. They, too, will watch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And watch them, for they will soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And watch them and they shall see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (then) see them, so they too shall see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and see them; soon they shall see!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And watch, for they will (soon) see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Watch them: they will soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And see them thou; they themselves shall presently see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and watch them; soon they will see [the truth of the matter]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And watch them (how they fare), and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And watch them and they shall see (the punishment)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: See them and soon they shall see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And watch them—they will soon see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:175]   and watch them, when the chastisement is sent down on them; for they will [soon] see, the consequences of their disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And watch) inform them about Allah's punishment, (for they will (soon) see) what will be done to them.
